fields.label: Full Name
fields.name: biography_name
fields.instructions: (Display name) The name of the subject of this biography

fields.label: Last Name
fields.name: biography_lastname
fields.instructions: The last name of the subject of this biography, for alphabetical order in display

fields.label: Biography Author
fields.name: biography_author
fields.instructions: The name of the person writing this biography

fields.label: Country of Origin/Citizenship
fields.name: country_of_origin_citizenship
fields.instructions: Ex. "United States/American"

fields.label: Kind of Artist/Cultural Worker
fields.name: kind_of_artist_cultural_worker
fields.instructions: Ex. "Painter"

fields.label: Date & Places of Overlap with Loy
fields.name: date_places_of_overlap_with_loy

fields.label: Avant-Garde Movements the Figure Was Associated With
fields.name: avantgarde_movements_the_figure_was_associated_with

fields.label: Works Cited
fields.name: works_cited
fields.instructions: To increase the size of this field, drag this text area from the lower-right corner.

fields.label: Genres
fields.name: ml_genres
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Genre" button to add as many genres as apply to this collection

fields.label: Disciplines
fields.name: ml_disciplines
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Discipline" button to add as many disciplines as relate to this resource.  At least one is required.

fields.label: Collex Text
fields.name: ml_collex_text
fields.instructions: Text to be displayed in the <collex:text> field, as a description of the entire collection.

fields.label: Media Type
fields.name: media_type
fields.instructions: The type of media this contribution contains

fields.label: Use Real Name
fields.name: use_real_name
fields.instructions: Whether or not this contributor wishes to use a real name

fields.label: First Name
fields.name: first_name
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Last Name
fields.name: last_name
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Preferred Name
fields.name: preferred_name
fields.instructions: (Optional) Use this field if a user wishes to use a pseudonym instead of a name.  This field will not be shown publicly if a real name is provided.

fields.label: Email Address
fields.name: email_address
fields.instructions: Contributor's email address.  Leave blank if the contributor does not wish to share their email address publicly.

fields.label: Institutional Affiliation
fields.name: institutional_affiliation
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Occupation
fields.name: occupation
fields.instructions: (Optional)

fields.label: Additional Authors
fields.name: additional_authors
fields.instructions: List any additional authors by their full names. (These names will be displayed publicly with this post, if included here.)

fields.label: Media URL
fields.name: media_url
fields.instructions: Plaintext hyperlink (not an embed code) to the web player for this content.  (YouTube, SoundCloud, etc.)  Please note: This will not add the video to the post below!  This will be shown only in the PDF print view.  Videos/Audio/etc must still be added to the post, via embed codes.  See site documentation for instructions.

fields.label: Genres
fields.name: ml_genres
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Genre" button to add as many genres as apply to this collection

fields.label: Disciplines
fields.name: ml_disciplines
fields.instructions: Use the "Add Discipline" button to add as many disciplines as relate to this resource.  At least one is required.

fields.label: Peer Reviewed
fields.name: ml_peer_reviewed
fields.instructions: Whether this chapter or collection has been peer reviewed

fields.label: Peer Review Date
fields.name: ml_reviewdate
fields.instructions: The date of most recent peer review

fields.label: Peer Reviewed
fields.name: peer_reviewed_page
fields.instructions: Has this essay or essay section (Page) been peer reviewed?

fields.label: Peer Reviewed
fields.name: peer_reviewed_post
fields.instructions: Check this box if this post should be labeled with a "Peer Reviewed" seal.

fields.label: Primary Text Title
fields.name: primary_text_title
fields.instructions: Title of the Primary Text

fields.label: Primary Text Author
fields.name: primary_text_author
fields.instructions: Name of the Primary Text author(s)

fields.label: Primary Text Link
fields.name: primary_text_link
fields.instructions: Link to this text, if available.

fields.label: Primary Text Citation
fields.name: primary_text_citation
fields.instructions: Citation format for Primary Text, if available.

fields.label: Primary Text Content
fields.name: primary_text_content
fields.instructions: Write or paste the Primary Text itself here.  (This will appear in the main text area, to the left, or above if viewed on a smaller screen.)

fields.label: Close Reading Title
fields.name: secondary_text_title
fields.instructions: Title of the Secondary Text

fields.label: Close Reading Author
fields.name: secondary_text_author
fields.instructions: Name of the Secondary Text author(s)

fields.label: Secondary Text Link
fields.name: secondary_text_link
fields.instructions: Link to this text, if available.

fields.label: Secondary Text Citation
fields.name: secondary_text_citation
fields.instructions: Citation format for Secondary Text, if available.

fields.label: Secondary Text Content
fields.name: secondary_text_content
fields.instructions: Write or paste the Secondary Text itself here.  (This will appear in the secondary text area, to the right, or below if viewed on a smaller screen.)
